name: OurShootArena.io
description:
OurShootArena.io is a Multiplayer Shooter Game made in construct 2 and you can attack other players in world.

Game Modes:

  • Normal: No Spawning soilds.
  • Revenge: Spawning Soilds manually in this game unless there is no 1 more player.

Game Instructions:

AWSD to move around.

Left Mouse Button to shoot.

Move Mouse to aim.
